body.description: The RedTop high-performance AGM battery is the ultimate starting battery designed to deliver a powerful burst of ignition power for a reliable start-up every time. It will withstand hard launches, extreme corners and is race proven for every road every day whether it's used as a truck battery, automotive battery, or for other applications. Its reputation as a truck battery or automotive battery is unsurpassed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RedTop 34-78 shown above Our Promise Ultimate Power, for the ultimate professionals, for the ultimate enthusiasts. And for the ultimate experience. That's our goal each and every day. We look for every technological advantage to push the limits of what's possible and leave pretenders in our dust. We manufacture our own batteries in our own facilities to our demanding standards.To ensure quality and consistency in our batteries, no matter where they are being sold - our batteries are never re-labled or re-spec'd. Gentlemen, Start Your Engines The RedTop high-performance AGM battery is the ultimate starting battery designed to deliver a powerful burst of ignition power for a reliable start-up every time. It will withstand hard launches, extreme corners and is race proven for every road every day whether it's used as a truck battery, automotive battery, or for other applications. Its reputation as a truck battery or automotive battery is unsurpassed. Strong starting burst More than 15 times the vibration resistance Spillproof, mountable in virtually any position Maintenance-free with up to 2x longer life Faster recharging With impressive high-power delivery and extreme resistance to the most common causes of battery failure, the RedTop is ideal for trucks, SUVs, hot rods, street cars.

SpiralCell Technology At the heart of every OPTIMA battery is a series of individual spiral-wound cells comprised of two pure (99.99%) lead plates coated in a precise coating of lead oxide. One coated plate is positive and the other is negative. The unique manufacturing process of spiral winding continuous lead plates is far more precision-controlled and expensive than building traditional flat plate AGM batteries. Custom automated cell-winding machines are required to maintain the close tolerances required to maintain quality and performance. Critical tolerances, temperatures, humidity and automated processes are maintained and constantly monitored. OPTIMA has built over 100 million individual spiral cells since the early 1990’s.

What's the difference between OPTIMA RedTop, YellowTop, and BlueTop Batteries? RedTop For normal engine starting where an alternator immediately monitors the state of charge and provides energy to the battery whenever it is needed. This would describe most stock vehicles, including: automotive and RV underhood starting, heavy equipment where starting is the primary function, and diesel vehicles without aftermarket electronics. YellowTop Use this when electrical loads are higher than average, or when the discharge cycle is more than typical engine starting, such as vehicles with multiple electronic accessories and vehicles without alternators. This can also include vehicles with a lot of factory electronics such as power sliding doors and a DVD player. Examples also include: racing vehicles without a charging system, dedicated drag racers, diesel powered vehicles with aftermarket electronics, and vehicles with inverters, winches, or other accessories. BlueTop The BlueTop starting battery (dark gray case) is to be used when a dedicated starting battery is required and it should never be used for cycling duty. Use a BlueTop starting battery for marine applications and RVs when the battery's only function is engine starting. The dual purpose BlueTop (light gray case) can be used for both starting and deep cycling -- it is a true deep cycle battery with extremely high cranking power. Uses include: trolling motors, marine applications with heavy electrical accessories, and RVs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality at its best been using these for years. I last one lasted literally almost 8 years and ever since then I will only use these

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dead after a year.
reviews.reviewText: Lasted a year then wont hold a charge. Dont buy optima batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: …so good. My car starts now in the mornings. Such a relief.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this battery November of 2019.Started having trouble in 2022. I refuse to believe that it was the battery. I thought I had a parasitic draw on my suburban lo and behold. It turned out to be the battery,I thought the battery was gonna outlast regular batteries it didn’t well there’s my two Cents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a car and the previous owner had a cheap battery in it so I wanted to upgrade. I installed the Optima battery and went on a short run. Everything was fine until 2 weeks later when I tried to start the car. The battery was dead so dead it was difficult to get it to charge. Once charged it would go down quickly so maybe a bad cell, I tried contacting support but they never respond. The battery says 3 year free replacement but I can’t get it replaced if I can’t reach them. I got 2 of the batteries and one is still in the Amazon box so I could send it back or gamble that it’s good and put it in the car and keep trying to return the other one. I have no faith in it since it was totally dead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An AGM replacement for traditional Lead-acid.
reviews.reviewText: The Corvette C5 model has delicate wiring and components that sits directly under the battery. Traditional lead-acid batteries can leak and could cause irreparable damage to the car. The previous owner was apparently clueless and had a cheap lead-acid. This red top AGM battery allows more protection. Went to Amazon because local auto supply shops did not have the needed size. Price was competitive and got a $10 gift card from an auto supply shop for bringing in the old battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Husband was looking for a low profile battery for his 54 Chevy ,Easy to installVery low profileGreat battery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but worth alteration
reviews.reviewText: 1 of the best gel pacs out there. last 1 lasted 4 years and died because I didn't start it for a while, which is a nono with gel pacs. It's smaller than a regular battery. The base does fit well, but securing with standard long wingnut system might need to be altered a little as it's thinner. Overall, this smallest version of this product is definitely worth the $ and small adjustments as it has outperformed every battery I've ever used. Highly recommend
Put these in all my vehicles, last forever and haven't had one fail yet. This seller is amazing to work with and I will definitely be using them again in the future.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llego con dos años en su sello y hubo que cargarlo para que pudiera funcionar.
reviews.reviewText: Llego con dos años en su sello y hubo que cargarlo para que pudiera funcionar. Mal por parte del vendedor, la batería que compré tiene menos años de vida que lo que esperaba.

reviews.reviewTitle: Battery works good but did not fit very good not wide enough had to shim with piece of wood
reviews.reviewText: Only had issue with width other than that battery works good

The battery stopped holding a charge after not even 500kilometers. I tried contacting manufacturer several times without success. I want to be contacted by Amazon not a third party seller. Look at all the items that I’ve purchased through Amazon the least you can do is explain why an item that I purchased for my vehicle driven sparingly in the summer months only not driven in winter is no longer working Waiting to hear from Amazon.Maurizio.

Ordered this battery for a winch for pulling up a dock and boat lift. Works extremely well and am very satisfied. JAMES was very helpful and gives great advise as to the care of the battery to prolong the life span. Will not hesitate to purchase through Them again.
